title: Reciproc Cafe
description: A vegetarian coffee shop (with vegan options) serves fair trade, organic and/or locally sourced products and produce. Offers lemonades, juices, coffee (can be made with soy milk on request), beer and wine. Also has a small shop that sells preserves, wine, coffee, chocolates and other ethically sourced goods, some of which are vegan. Coffee shop belongs to a local organization fighting for fair trade and responsible consumerism, plus they also try to support local farmers. Sometimes host events where they allow the organizers to bring meat.
